metadata.title: Bilibili Audio & Douyin Video Downloader - Free Online MP3 & Video Download Tool
metadata.description: Free online tool for Bilibili audio extraction and Douyin video downloads. Convert Bilibili videos to MP3, download Douyin videos without watermark. Auto-detect platform, one-click download.
metadata.keywords: Bilibili audio download, Douyin video downloader, Douyin video download, Bilibili to MP3, Douyin no watermark, Douyin no-watermark, Douyin downloader, video downloader, audio extractor, free video download, online video downloader, Douyin video download, short video downloader, MP3 converter
metadata.ogTitle: Bilibili Audio & Douyin Video Downloader - Free Online Tool
metadata.ogDescription: Professional Bilibili audio and Douyin video download tool. Extract MP3 from Bilibili videos, download Douyin videos without watermark. Auto-detect platform, high-quality downloads.

features.title: Why Choose Our Audio Downloader?
features.subtitle: Professional, secure, and efficient Bilibili audio extraction tool

quality.title: High-Quality Audio
quality.description: Automatically selects the best audio quality, supports high-definition audio formats to ensure you get the best listening experience.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Uses advanced audio extraction technology for fast processing and conversion, saving your valuable time.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: No registration required, no payment needed, free to use forever. Supports batch download history management.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: Local processing, no user data or video content stored, ensuring your privacy and security.

steps.title: How to Use?
steps.subtitle: Complete audio download in three simple steps

step1.title: Copy Link
step1.description: Copy the video link you want to download audio from on Bilibili website or APP. Supports both BV and AV number formats.

step2.title: Paste Link
step2.description: Paste the copied link into the input box above. You can use the quick paste button or manually enter it.

step3.title: Download Now
step3.description: Click the download button, the system will automatically extract audio and start downloading. Files will be saved to your default download directory.

technical.title: Technical Features
technical.subtitle: Advanced technology ensures the best experience

extraction.title: Smart Audio Extraction
extraction.description: Uses advanced audio separation technology to extract high-quality audio tracks from videos.

formats.title: Multi-Format Support
formats.description: Supports mainstream audio formats like MP3, AAC, compatible with various playback devices.

compatibility.title: Device Compatible
compatibility.description: Supports desktop and mobile access, cross-platform usage without barriers.

reliability.title: Stable & Reliable
reliability.description: 24/7 stable operation with high availability ensuring it's always accessible.

legal.title: Usage Statement
legal.subtitle: Please use this tool legally and compliantly
legal.personalUse: This tool is for personal learning and research use only, not for commercial purposes.
legal.copyright: Please respect the copyright of original creators, downloaded audio content is for personal enjoyment only.
legal.support: We recommend supporting original creators and obtaining audio content through legitimate channels.
legal.disclaimer: Users are responsible for any legal consequences arising from the use of this tool.

format.question: What link formats are supported?
format.answer: Supports standard Bilibili video links, including BV and AV number formats, e.g.: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1xx411c7mD

quality.question: What about audio quality?
quality.answer: Automatically selects the highest audio quality from the video for extraction, typically 128kbps or higher quality audio.

limit.question: Are there download limits?
limit.answer: Currently no download limit, but please use reasonably to avoid excessive server pressure.

safety.question: How is security guaranteed?
safety.answer: This site stores no user data, processing occurs in a secure server environment, protecting user privacy.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This privacy policy explains how Bilibili Audio Downloader (referred to as 'we' or 'this service') collects, uses, stores and protects user information. We understand the importance of privacy protection and are committed to protecting users' personal information security.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.subtitle: Types of information we collect
collection.noPersonalData: We do not collect any personally identifiable information, including but not limited to names, emails, phone numbers, etc.
collection.technicalData: We may collect technical information such as IP addresses, browser types, device information, etc., solely for service optimization and security protection.
collection.usageData: We may collect service usage statistics such as access counts, download counts, etc., to improve service quality.

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.subtitle: How we use collected information
usage.serviceProvision: Providing and maintaining audio download services
usage.security: Protecting service security and preventing abuse
usage.analytics: Conducting anonymous data analysis to understand user needs

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.subtitle: Data storage and protection measures
storage.noStorage: We do not store user-uploaded video links or downloaded audio files.
storage.temporary: Temporary data during processing is immediately deleted after completion.
storage.security: All data transmission is protected using HTTPS encryption protocol.

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.subtitle: Use of cookies and similar technologies
cookies.localStorage: We use local storage to save your download history, this data is only stored on your device.
cookies.analytics: We may use third-party analytics tools (such as Google Analytics) to understand website usage.
cookies.ads: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements, please refer to Google's privacy policy for related cookie policies.

rights.title: User Rights
rights.subtitle: Your rights and choices
rights.access: Since we do not collect personal information, no data access functionality is needed.
rights.deletion: You can clear local storage data in your browser at any time.
rights.optOut: You can disable cookies and JavaScript through browser settings.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and major changes will be notified on the website homepage.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through GitHub Issues.
